post.desc:
Tewi, you tricked frickin' sharks to cross over to Tottori as part of your myth.

Come to think of it, going by that myth, Tewi definitely has seen the sea. I don't think a lot of Gensokyo locals have been to the sea. Hmm... There's Mamizou, I suppose. Sado is also an island.

Context: Phantasmagoria of Flower View, [Tewi Stage 8](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Phantasmagoria_of_Flower_View/Story/Tewi%27s_Scenario#Tewi_vs._Komachi_(Episode_8)).
